org.opendaylight.controller.sal.streams.listeners

Class Notificator

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.opendaylight.controller.sal.streams.listeners.Notificator

  • public class Notificator
extends java.lang.Object
    Notificator is responsible to create, remove and find ListenerAdapter listener.

      • createStreamNameFromUri

        public static java.lang.String createStreamNameFromUri(java.lang.String uri)
        Looks for listener determined by YangInstanceIdentifier path and removes it. Creates String representation of stream name from URI. Removes slash from URI in start and end position.
        Parameters:
        uri - URI for creation stream name.
        Returns:
        String representation of stream name.

      • removeAllListeners

        public static void removeAllListeners()
        Removes all listeners.

      • removeListenerIfNoSubscriberExists

        public static void removeListenerIfNoSubscriberExists(ListenerAdapter listener)
        Checks if listener has at least one subscriber. In case it doesn't have any, delete listener.
        Parameters:
        listener - ListenerAdapter
